timeline.bodyText:
I'm fine with doubling these values.
I also wonder whether we could introduce a mechanism similar to org.jboss.as.test.shared.TimeoutUtil to influence the timeouts with the ts.timeout.factor system property?
timeline.author: jmesnil

replies.bodyText: Makes sense. We'd need to port TimeoutUtil though as I don't think we want to add the dep on testsuite-shared.  That's no big deal though.
replies.author: bstansberry

replies.bodyText: I updated the commit with the relevant code added directly to the Server class.
replies.author: bstansberry

replies.bodyText: I'm pretty sure the TimeoutUtil is already in core right? https://github.com/wildfly/wildfly-core/blob/master/testsuite/shared/src/main/java/org/jboss/as/test/shared/TimeoutUtil.java
replies.author: jamezp

replies.bodyText: That's correct, it's in core but for classes shared by the test suite. afaict, the testrunner does not depend on these shared classes.
replies.author: jmesnil
